name: Mining Mayhem (Eric268)
description: Mining Mayhem is a mining mini-game where the player must attempt to extract the maximum amount of resources before their attempts run out. It is designed to be included as a resource gathering feature of another larger game. Players can first use the scan tool to reveal a 5x5 section of the covered tiles. After the scans have been used the player has 3 extract attempts where they will mine all of the resources directly under the cursor and mine one layer of all other tiles in a 5x5 section surrounding the main extraction point. Different tile colors show different value with gold being the highest and purple being the lowest.
